entry.p: Because I spent most of my time in 2015 working at my day job and on the side researching the book I'm writing about Henry David Thoreau, I published very little in 2015 at the Monadnock Valley Press - really just A Doll's House by Henrik Ibsen and the Meditations by Marcus Aurelius. Here's hoping I can do better in 2016. We also earned only $150.63, a 50% drop from 2014. I'll need to talk to our director of sales and marketing about that... ;-)
